channel.title: Lil Mysql error
channel.description:
Can anyone guide me with why this code doesn't work? thanks :rolleyes:
private static final String userName = "jamie_toplist"; private static final String userPass = "mypass";//this is filled in with my pass and is 100% correct. private static final String databaseUrl = "sitename.com/:3306/jamie_toplist";
Checked Mysql several times, these details are correct, i think its the database url. Many thanks.

item.title: Lil Mysql error
item.dc:creator: @The_Outsider The Outsider
item.description:
@The_Outsider wrote:

Can you un-archive a fresh copy of the server you are using and find what it was before? See if you removed something.

Read full topic
